https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/szJK6S28MaV5rL64OnRrUHx2tFV.jpg When a lorry driver realises that he is helping an escaped convict, he threatens to hand him over to the police. The convict begins to narrate the circumstances that landed him in jail. Adhu Oru Kana Kaalam
